text: læa phlitphl khxng khea thuk thalay hmd læw khea k prakb famux thang sxng dwy khwam seiycı tx sing thi khea k prakb famux thang sxng dwy khwam seiycı tx sing thi khea di cabcay pi læa man phangphab lng ma læa khea klaw wa “xo! Hak chan mi xea phu dı ma tang phakhi kab phraphupenceakhxng chan”
